A

ACTION_ADD_GRAMMAR - Static variable in class com.vuzix.speech.Constants
Broadcast Action: Add the grammar specified by Constants.EXTRA_GRAMMAR and give it the name specified by Constants.EXTRA_GRAMMAR_NAME.
ACTION_REMOVE_GRAMMAR - Static variable in class com.vuzix.speech.Constants
Broadcast Action: Remove the grammar with the name specified by Constants.EXTRA_GRAMMAR_NAME.
ACTION_SET_MODEL - Static variable in class com.vuzix.speech.Constants
Broadcast Action: Switches the currently loaded acoustic model to the one specified by Constants.EXTRA_MODEL.
ACTION_SET_WORDLIST - Static variable in class com.vuzix.speech.Constants
Broadcast Action: Tells the speech recognizer to switch acoustic models to the one specified by Constants.EXTRA_WORDLIST.
ACTION_STOP_RECOGNIZER - Static variable in class com.vuzix.speech.Constants
Broadcast Action: Tell the speech recognizer to stop entirely and close.
ACTION_STOP_RECOGNIZING - Static variable in class com.vuzix.speech.Constants
Broadcast Action: Tell the speech recognizer to stop listening until it gets told to start again with SpeechRecognizer.startListening(android.content.Intent).
addGrammar(byte[], String) - Method in class com.vuzix.speech.VoiceControl
Adds a grammar to the current list of grammars in the form of a byte array.
addGrammar(String, String) - Method in class com.vuzix.speech.VoiceControl
Adds a grammar to the current list of grammars in the form of a String containing a path to a compile grammar file.
addGrammar(int) - Method in class com.vuzix.speech.VoiceControl
Adds a grammar with a Constant from Constants.
addRecContextB(byte[], int, String) - Static method in class com.vuzix.speech.MainActivity
 
addRecContextI(int, String) - Static method in class com.vuzix.speech.MainActivity
 
addRecContextS(String, String) - Static method in class com.vuzix.speech.MainActivity

C

com.vuzix.speech - package com.vuzix.speech
 
Constants - Class in com.vuzix.speech
The class containing all the constants for the Vuzix speech recognizer.

D

destroy() - Method in class com.vuzix.speech.VoiceControl
Destroys the SpeechRecognizer object to prevent leaking the service.

E

endOfSpeech() - Static method in class com.vuzix.speech.MainActivity
 
EXTRA_GRAMMAR - Static variable in class com.vuzix.speech.Constants
Used as an int, String, or byte array extra field in Constants.ACTION_ADD_GRAMMAR intents to specify the grammar to be added.
EXTRA_GRAMMAR_NAME - Static variable in class com.vuzix.speech.Constants
Used as a String extra field in Constants.ACTION_ADD_GRAMMAR and Constants.ACTION_REMOVE_GRAMMAR intents to specify the name of the grammar to be added or removed.
EXTRA_MODEL - Static variable in class com.vuzix.speech.Constants
Used as an int extra field in Constants.ACTION_SET_MODEL intents to specify the acoustic model.
EXTRA_WORDLIST - Static variable in class com.vuzix.speech.Constants
Used as a space-delimited String extra field in Constants.ACTION_SET_WORDLIST intents to specify the wordlist against which to compare the recognition results.
